lights
A 000110001101100110101000
B 000110001101100110100100
C 000110001101100110100001
D 000110001101100110100010

sockets
1 011110000010100000001111
2 011110000010100000001101
3 011110000010100000001011
4 011110000010100000000111
5 011110000010100000000101

* 011110000010100000000010
* 011110000010100000000001

switch library adds a trailing zero
